title: Simple Breakfast Strata
directions: Coat an 8-inch square baking dish with cooking spray. Place bread in a single layer in bottom of baking dish.
In a medium bowl, beat eggs, milk, and thyme until blended; pour over bread. Sprinkle with bacon. Refrigerate, covered, at least 30 minutes, or as long as overnight.
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Remove strata from refrigerator, uncover, and let stand while oven is heating.
Bake in center of oven 30 minutes. Sprinkle with cheese. Continue baking until puffed, golden, and firm in center, about 5 additional minutes.
ingredients: 4 slices dense white or whole grain bread
